languages.text: "Вот стану старой и норовистой, тоже потребую ароматических масел и кальяна для окуривания моих священных легких. Хотя… зачем ждать?"

traits.locale_text: "Вот стану старой и норовистой, тоже потребую ароматических масел и кальяна для окуривания моих священных легких. Хотя… зачем ждать?"

languages.text: "When I'm old and cantankerous, I'll demand aromatic unguents and a hookah to fumigate my sacred lungs too. Then again... why wait?"
languages.original_text: "Вот стану старой и норовистой, тоже потребую ароматических масел и кальяна для окуривания моих священных легких. Хотя… зачем ждать?"

traits.locale_text: "When I'm old and cantankerous, I'll demand aromatic unguents and a hookah to fumigate my sacred lungs too. Then again... why wait?"
"When I'm old and cantankerous, I'll demand aromatic unguents and a hookah to fumigate my sacred lungs too. Then again... why wait?"
"When I'm old and cantankerous, I'll demand aromatic unguents and a hookah to fumigate my sacred lungs too. Then again... why wait?"
"When I'm old and cantankerous, I'll demand aromatic unguents and a hookah to fumigate my sacred lungs too. Then again... why wait?"
"When I'm old and cantankerous, I'll demand aromatic unguents and a hookah to fumigate my sacred lungs too. Then again... why wait?"
"When I'm old and cantankerous, I'll demand aromatic unguents and a hookah to fumigate my sacred lungs too. Then again... why wait?"

languages.text: «Cuando sea vieja y gruñona, también exigiré ungüentos aromáticos y una pipa para fumigar mis sagrados pulmones. Aunque... ¿por qué esperar?».
languages.original_text: "When I'm old and cantankerous, I'll demand aromatic unguents and a hookah to fumigate my sacred lungs too. Then again... why wait?"

traits.locale_text: «Cuando sea vieja y gruñona, también exigiré ungüentos aromáticos y una pipa para fumigar mis sagrados pulmones. Aunque... ¿por qué esperar?».

languages.text: 「私が年老いて気難しくなったら、芳香のある軟膏と、神聖な肺を燻すための鉤針も要求するでしょう。そしてまた…何故待つ必要があるのでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "When I'm old and cantankerous, I'll demand aromatic unguents and a hookah to fumigate my sacred lungs too. Then again... why wait?"

traits.locale_text: 「私が年老いて気難しくなったら、芳香のある軟膏と、神聖な肺を燻すための鉤針も要求するでしょう。そしてまた…何故待つ必要があるのでしょう？」

languages.text: “等我老了，整天没好气儿的时候，我也要弄点芳香的药膏和水烟，熏熏我神圣的肺子。但话说回来……干吗要等到那个时候呢？”
languages.original_text: "When I'm old and cantankerous, I'll demand aromatic unguents and a hookah to fumigate my sacred lungs too. Then again... why wait?"

traits.locale_text: “等我老了，整天没好气儿的时候，我也要弄点芳香的药膏和水烟，熏熏我神圣的肺子。但话说回来……干吗要等到那个时候呢？”

languages.text: "Wenn ich alt und mürrisch bin, werde ich auch nur aromatische Salben und eine Wasserpfeife verlangen, um meine heiligen Lungen zu desinfizieren. Andererseits ... wozu warten?"
languages.original_text: "When I'm old and cantankerous, I'll demand aromatic unguents and a hookah to fumigate my sacred lungs too. Then again... why wait?"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich alt und mürrisch bin, werde ich auch nur aromatische Salben und eine Wasserpfeife verlangen, um meine heiligen Lungen zu desinfizieren. Andererseits ... wozu warten?"

languages.text: « Quand je serai vieille et acariâtre, moi aussi j'exigerai des onguents aromatiques et un narguilé pour traiter mes poumons sacrés. Tout bien réfléchi… pourquoi attendre ? »
languages.original_text: "When I'm old and cantankerous, I'll demand aromatic unguents and a hookah to fumigate my sacred lungs too. Then again... why wait?"

traits.locale_text: « Quand je serai vieille et acariâtre, moi aussi j'exigerai des onguents aromatiques et un narguilé pour traiter mes poumons sacrés. Tout bien réfléchi… pourquoi attendre ? »

languages.text: "Ben de yaşlanıp huysuzlaştığımda aromalı özyağlar ve kutsal ciğerlerimi tütsülemek için bir nargile isteyeceğim. Gerçi... Niye bekleyeyim?"
languages.original_text: "When I'm old and cantankerous, I'll demand aromatic unguents and a hookah to fumigate my sacred lungs too. Then again... why wait?"
